enum.name: weapon_targeting
enum.comment: This must be set to manual_only to fix a bug where squads can auto-target the building for a few moments even after the enemy has vacated.

template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment:
NOTE: As a temporary measure, buildings have been given a small armour value. In CoH2 buildings were largely immune to small arms fire because of the panel system which would restrict certain weapon types against them.
Not sure if we'll use this system or if we could get away with armor and possibly some specific target type tables.

file.name: alternate_sua
file.comment: this should be pointing to the custom simbox created for th building

float.name: outer_height
float.comment:
Based on the comments, it feels like this should be less than 0 and it traditionally has been. However, through testing, it seems like even if this is set to 0, units are still able to see below them just fine.
NOTE: Jianfu suggested that this may exist just to soften the slope of the lampshade. -Brock 2017

list.name: accessories_1f
list.comment: 1st floor accessories (door and window examples inside)
